summary: The 'Freedom from Improper Regulation and Enforcement Act' (FIRE Act) aims to prohibit capacity-based restrictions on firearm magazines at the federal, state, and local levels. The bill amends Title 18 of the United States Code to prevent government officials from enforcing regulations limiting magazine capacity. It defines 'firearm magazine' and 'capacity' and specifies that the changes take effect 30 days after enactment.
